entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -35.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salluit Airport 2:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -35.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -39.9°C
Wind: SW 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 34. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 34. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 32. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Local blowing snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. High minus 32. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
